resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157103</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157103</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Music Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet de Musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Da Música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Di Musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα μουσικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto De la Música</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are detailed student instructions for carrying out a 10th grade project.through which students learn English by listening to and writing about songs. Includes work on vocabulary and grammar, writing activities and an oral presentation, as well as assessment rubris</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">songs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment rubrics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind ausführliche Kursteilnehmeranweisungen 
für das Durchführen eines 10. Grades project.through, dem 
Kursteilnehmer Englisch erlernen, indem sie zu hören und über Liede 
schreiben. Schließt Arbeit über Wortschatz und Grammatik ein 
und schreibt Aktivitäten und eine Munddarstellung, sowie 
Einschätzung rubris</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont des instructions détaillées d'étudiant 
pour effectuer une 10ème catégorie project.through laquelle les 
étudiants apprennent l'anglais en écoutant et l'inscription au sujet
des chansons. Inclut le travail sur le vocabulaire et la 
grammaire, écrivant des activités et une présentation orale, aussi 
bien que des rubris d'évaluation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas são instruções detalhadas do estudante 
para realizar uma 10o classe project.through que os estudantes 
aprendam o inglês escutando e escrevendo sobre canções. 
Inclui o trabalho no vocabulário e a gramática, escrevendo 
atividades e uma apresentação oral, as.well.as rubris da 
avaliação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste sono istruzioni dettagliate dell'allievo per
l'avanzamento del decimo grado project.through cui gli allievi 
imparano l'inglese ascoltando e scrivendo circa le canzoni. 
Include il lavoro su vocabolario e la grammatica, scrivendo le 
attività e una presentazione orale, così come i rubris di 
valutazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές είναι λεπτομερείς οδηγίες σπουδαστών για την 
πραγματοποίηση μιας 10ης τάξης project.through που οι σπουδαστές
μαθαίνουν τα αγγλικά με το άκουσμα και το γράψιμο για τα 
τραγούδια. Περιλαμβάνει την εργασία για το λεξιλόγιο και τη 
γραμματική, τις δραστηριότητες γραψίματος και μια προφορική 
παρουσίαση, καθώς επίσης και τα rubris αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstas son instrucciones detalladas del estudiante 
para realizar un 10mo grado project.through el cual los estudiantes 
aprendan inglés escuchando y escribiendo sobre canciones. 
Incluye el trabajo sobre vocabulario y la gramática, 
escribiendo actividades y una presentación oral, así como rubris del
gravamen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liede</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung Rubriken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chansons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rubriques d'évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rubrics da avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzoni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρουμπρίκες αξιολόγησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
